title: Extra: Designated Survivor Reboot on Netflix
itunes:title: Extra: Designated Survivor Reboot on Netflix
description:
In this Sound On Extra podcast, Eric Schultz, Senior Advisor to Barack Obama and Founder and CEO of the Schultz Group discusses his role as a consultant on Season 3 of the Netflix political thriller "Designated Survivor."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
